facts: Recycling reduces landfill waste and pollution.
Glass can be recycled endlessly without loss.
Composting turns food waste into valuable soil.
Paper recycling saves trees and conserves resources.
Plastic bottles can be recycled into clothing.
E-waste recycling prevents harmful environmental impacts.
Waste reduction promotes a sustainable and cleaner environment.
Recycled materials create jobs and economic opportunities.
Educating on waste disposal fosters environmental responsibility.
